tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Teeth,Crowded Teeth,Dental Tartar,Tooth Decay,Rotten Teeth,
review: We visited the doctor for dental related issues both for me and my mother.Althouth the treatment takes along time for the surgical procedure it is definitely worth it all my dental issues are resolved even my mother also don't have any complaints after the procedure the ambiance is good and with good music being played  I will definitely recommend the doctor for all sorts of dental issues.

**** ** *** * **** ********
I got my filling and general cleaning done at this clinic. A bit about Dr. Chandni-
1. Extremely patient. I talked a lot and she responded to all comments 
2. ************* The answers I received on my queries, be it related to the treatment I went to get, or in general dental science, she answered all satisfactorily
3. Knows what she is doing. Filling on the teeth, upside and on the sides, was a bit uneven. So she adjusted it and it was fixed for top. Yet on the sides it was uneven. She corrected it just enough to align it to the other teeths. 
4. Polite. 

About the clinic experience, nothing out of the ordinary. It was okay.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very patient friendly doctor. Understands the patient problem in detail, detailed explanation of the treatment and prompt support for follow-up visits or any remote call queries. Clean and hygienic clinic. Treatment was done without any hurry and ensuring the patient is always at ease. Appointment happens at given time slot, without any waiting time. Recommended doctor for any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had my root canal treatment done here and it was a very easy experience overall, I was explained on each and every process very well and clear, the whole treatment expense was pocket friendly and very well taken care of with each appointment, didn't feel even an ounce of pain throughout, Highly recommended for your dental treatment.

Good, well maintained clinic. I was here for a missing tooth which needed a bridge. I was also recommended a scaling before the procedure. The treatment was timely and got over in 2 sittings - much lesser than what I thought it would be. All in all - a very nice experience!

I visited Dr.Chandani for my wife as she had sensitivity in tooth. She investigated and advised RCT needs to be done, also discussed procedure with us in details, which was very helpful in understanding the issue.
It was 4 sittings work, after every visit she used to do follow up call whether she is having any pain/discomfort. 
Dr. Chandani combines expertise and a willingness to listen and discuss.
The clinic was very clean and I highly recommend this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited for removal of stains on my teeth and Dr Chandni suggested to go for cleaning. I also got bleaching procedure done after experiencing the quality of treatment. The clinic was very neat and clean. 
Dr, herself was very friendly and explained the procedure before doing it.

I visited dr chandni for sensitivity in one tooth. She advised a filling. The procedure was done in half hour and i feel much better now. The sensitivity is gone. 
Will definitely recommend her for all the dental problems. 
The clinic is spacious, neat and clean. **** ** ***** Must visitüëç

Came to Dr Chandni for my mother‚Äôs tooth pain. *** ** ********* **** ********* ** **** ** ********** She ensured that my mother was comfortable during the entire procedure and explained with images of the affected area before starting the procedure. Absolutely recommend

I recently moved to Bangalore and visited Dr. Chandni for a regular checkup. She was friendly and provided me with valuable feedback on how to take care of my teeth. The clinic was clean and the waiting time was minimal. Overall, it was a great experience.

review: Dr.Chandini Madam was extremely friendly and describes each and every step of treatment woth love and care .Such a exceptional and worth paying a visit.The best part is quality in treatment and post treatment care.

Very nice experience here. They explain everything in details and suggested so many things.
Experienced staff.
Dr Chandni helped understand the exact problem  causing the gum inflammation and clearly suggested possible next steps. Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was able to get relief fairly quickly after the treatment. Went with a toothache and I am very happy with Dr. Chandni's caring and patient nature. Procedure was explained to me before starting. Thank you so much Dr.
I visited dr chandni for a regular checkup. She explained about the stains on my teeth. Really like the clean equipment and surrounding here.
I visited the clinic for a filling. The entire procedure was comfortable, and didn't take long. A major plus was there was not much waiting time. Happy with the treatment provided by Dr. Chandni!

I visited the clinic for a filling. 
Doctor made me comfortable throughout the procedure as i am scared of dental treatment. Everything went smoothly and the clinic was also clean.

I visited the clinic for cleaning. The doctor explained what to expect before the procedure since it was my first. The entire procedure was comfortable, and didn't take long. Happy with the treatment.

Good experience with end to end sanitization and hygiene  . I had gone for a routine check up and cleaning, and satisfied with the complete process. Friendly staff and doctor, and very well maintained clinic

Dr.Chandni was friendly. The Root canal treatment was really appreciable, since 3.5yrs I didnot notice any pain from both the teeth.

Thank you.
